Name: Key No. 20678 FY23 BRIDGE REPAIR
Description: bridge deck preservation and preventative maintenance to the bridges, bridge approaches and guardrail in various locations throughout District 1

Name: Key No. 20121 US-2, BNSF RR UNDERPASS, SANDPOINT
Description: lower US-2 under the BNSF RR bridge, widening the roadway from 3 lanes to 4 lanes. Includes asphalt paving, earthwork, grading, drainage, guardrail, MSE retaining walls, a soldier pile wall, utility relocation coord, temp shoring and traffic construction

Name: Key No. 20695 SH-53, N LATAH ST TO MP 9.3, RATHDRU...
Description: widening the roadway cross section from 2 to 3 lanes and widening shoulders to be used as right turn movements. This project is located on SH-53 between mile points 8.37 and 9.3.

Name: Key No. 20525 US-95, MP 515.5 to JCT SH-1
Description: pavement rehabilitation by CRABS and HMA overlay on US-95, MP 515.51 to MP 521.6 JCT SH-1

Name: Key No. 20735 US-20B, YELLOWSTONE HWY and HOLMES M...
Description: applying a microseal, striping and durastriping through the designated highways and MP limits.

Name: Key No. 23343 I-84, SOUTH JEROME IC TO TWIN FALLS ...
Description: widening I-84 to three lanes in each direction from MP 168 to MP 173 and replacing the eastbound and westbound 400 South Bridge; South Jerome IC to Twin Falls IC

Name: Key No. 20237 US-95, FY24 D1 SEALCOATS
Description: pavement preservation on US-95 from MP 378.7 Sanders Rd to MP 398.6 Benewah County Line, from MP 404.1 W. Conkling Rd to MP 421.2 W. Kidd Island bay Rd. Work would include a seal coat and pavement markings.

Name: Key No. 22228 US-95, OREGON STATE LINE TO SOMMERCA...
Description: restoring the pavement surface by constructing a Mill and Inlay, except from MP 3.23 to 3.28 and MP 3.72 to MP 3.81 where the road will be fully reconstructed to address swelling clay issues. Metal guardrail will also be upgraded. The prior Elephant Butte project area (MP 16.66 to MP 17.848) is excluded.

Name: Key No. 20688 I-15, ROSE IC TO N. LAVA ROCKS
Description: milling full width and placing an inlay and overlay on I-15 between MP 97.1 to MP 103.9. New guardrail and adjust guardrail and work on median crossovers are also included
